website_summaries.verdict: A well-crafted, highly durable window box made from weatherproof, UV-resistant molded plastic.
pros: We love the double-walled design, which creates a water reservoir to keep plants hydrated
Easy to install with included wall mount brackets
cons: Users must drill a hole in the planter to fill the water reservoir

customer_reviews.title: Attractive
customer_reviews.text: My husband installed 3 of these at our beach bungalow because we're only there on weekends. I think he's filled the reservoir twice all summer. The flowers look amazing. This bottom pic was taken on 6/19. The flowers were planted in May. (top photo) We get so many compliments. Spend the extra and buy the decorative brackets too. It completes the look.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful - husband installed in an hour or so... though I wish we knew before purchasing that you need to secure to a wood slat if attaching to siding.
customer_reviews.author: Meredith

customer_reviews.title: Look good, functional but smaller than I thought they'd be
customer_reviews.text: I got these to go on a balcony that has black wrought iron fencing. They sort of blend in which is what I was looking for (even though admittedly they sort of look like coffins). I am not really sure how the "self watering" works—it seemed fairly complicated in the instructions and involved drilling holes which I did not want to do. One thing to be aware of is that the planters are much smaller on the inside than the outside, so there is not really 3 feet worth of planting length. Over all they seem to be doing their job, and depending on how they survive the winter I may purchase more to line the ends of the balcony.
customer_reviews.author: ek917

customer_reviews.title: Excellent! They seem to be the perfect material to ...
customer_reviews.text: Excellent! They seem to be the perfect material to hold up for years to come as our front window boxes. Love the cute detail and they're much lighter in weight (but perfectly sturdy) compared to our previous galvanized steel window boxes (that we had for 12 years before they finally rusted out. Very happy.
customer_reviews.author: eileen

customer_reviews.title: I love the concept of having a water reservoir
customer_reviews.text: I love the concept of having a water reservoir! I hope my flowers succeed with its function. Installed pretty easily. Wish the fill hole was pre-drilled large enough for a hose. You need to drilll your own hole.
customer_reviews.author: mary

customer_reviews.title: Low maintenance watering, looks great!
customer_reviews.text: Love these boxes. Purchased two for my garage windows. Installing them was relatively easy, make sure you have some scrap wood to mount it to siding. The reservoir watering system makes it perfect for my drip line system. I drilled a small hole behind the box and ran 1/4 inch water lines into the box, runs a few minutes a day and keeps my flowers looking great.
customer_reviews.author: CS

customer_reviews.title: Gorgeous.
customer_reviews.text: These are very nice quality. I do wish there was a more descreet way to hide the boards to not be seen from the side view. The box profile makes the boards obvious. But they are beautiful from front and easy to rinse off. We have not used the wells and hole plugs yet but I get about 2 days of moisture from traditional watering. I have them in a shaded area so no fading as of yet. They are a matte, lightly textured, finish which looks great.
customer_reviews.author: Kels3yplace

customer_reviews.title: Three-foot planter box
customer_reviews.text: Love this planter! Such great quality and looks wonderful under our short kitchen window. I have gotten so many compliments from neighbors and "where did you get it?" It is very easy to hang and to water using the little hole that can be drilled out, so that it is never empty in the base. I have had a multimix of wildflowers in there since April, and they have done very well. It really adds curb appeal! I may buy a longer freestanding version for the front porch. For what you get, it IS worth the price!
customer_reviews.author: Sheryl J. Frailey

customer_reviews.title: Look good...from far away.
customer_reviews.text: They look good from far away. Much bulkier and plastic-looking than expected in-person and up close.
customer_reviews.author: sarahz

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and secure
customer_reviews.text: Very sturdy planter. Best price I could find for this specific one. Only issue was that the hardware it arrived with was not for brick or masonry and I had to purchase that elsewhere. The directions said to call if you wanted masonry screws instead, but I didn't want to wait for them to arrive.
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: Looks expensive
customer_reviews.text: I did not install these myself. So happy with end result!
customer_reviews.author: Momz

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and well made.
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install. Very sturdy. Added great curb appeal to our home.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Handsome but drain before winter
customer_reviews.text: Replaced one that cracked from frozen water. A caution is that you should drain the reservoir before winter. Handsome planter.
customer_reviews.author: Carol R. Taylor

customer_reviews.title: The best investment for the exterior of our home!
customer_reviews.text: Before purchasing, I was looking at alternatives that were less expensive; however, I couldn't have made a better choice with buying three of these window boxes. I would have been so disappointed to have gone with a less expensive, lower quality, window box. I can tell that they have greatly added to the curb appeal of my home. I love them!!
customer_reviews.author: amclamb

customer_reviews.title: Love this window box!
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I wanted and it looks so nice and is very sturdy!! Holds moisture to keep plants healthy!
customer_reviews.author: Robyn Henningsen

customer_reviews.title: Great looking and simple to install
customer_reviews.text: Second one I bought. They are wonderful. Easy to install and sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: deborah mills

customer_reviews.title: Mayne window planters!
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful self watering planters. Added just the right touch to my patio areas. I ordered two different sizes in black. Lots of compliments with flowers flowing all summer long and well into winter.
customer_reviews.author: Karen

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Product very Sturdy
customer_reviews.text: I got these in the spring and they are very sturdy and look great I got some many complements and when summer was over i switched over the decorating them for Fall excellent product
customer_reviews.author: Cindy

customer_reviews.title: be sure you want it
customer_reviews.text: there is no return policy, we didn't like it and now I am stuck with it
customer_reviews.author: JIm B

customer_reviews.title: Quality
customer_reviews.text: A wow box I bought s 3’ and a 5’ and plan to use them on my patio windows.
customer_reviews.author: Reba Haggard Brown

customer_reviews.title: Well made product!  Don’t hesitate to buy!
customer_reviews.text: Needed an additional unit! These window boxes are fantastic and look great! Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Jo M

customer_reviews.title: Works as advertised
customer_reviews.text: The set up for these window boxes is a little involved, but the directions are clear and the parts work well. I love that the boxes neatly snap on to the braces.
customer_reviews.author: Carl W Beaver

customer_reviews.title: Looks beautiful under my window
customer_reviews.text: Looks beautiful under my window. Well made and easy to install. So happy I bought this. I recommend this to anyone looking for a beautiful, economical and easy to install window box.
customer_reviews.author: Lisalee

customer_reviews.title: Great design
customer_reviews.text: These window planters completed our exterior look of our home.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great quality and value!
customer_reviews.text: The quality is amazing! I was very very surprised at how well made these are and how pretty! I cannot wait to hang them up! I got two of them!
customer_reviews.author: Andreea P.

customer_reviews.title: Finally; happy plants!
customer_reviews.text: Love these. My window boxes are in the sun all day. I have had a really hard time finding a way to keep the plants hydrated until this year. The self-watering system works great and the look is very classy.
customer_reviews.author: sue

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Planter
customer_reviews.text: This is a great planter. It is made very well and holds a lot. Quite sturdy. Love the fact that is stored water for the plants.
customer_reviews.author: Tom Munley

customer_reviews.title: LOVE THESE
customer_reviews.text: We bought these 4 years ago and they still look great and work great. Excellent product, they look great on our house.
customer_reviews.author: Keith Bormann

customer_reviews.title: They are substantial and look great!
customer_reviews.text: My neighbor installed the 3 window boxes recently. They look great and in the spring I’m sure they will look amazing filled with beautiful flowers!
customer_reviews.author: Maxine Mayer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: It is a very beautiful window box, well made and sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Planter
customer_reviews.text: This window planter looks beautiful. It is well made and has a trough deep enough to supply water to thirsty plants.
customer_reviews.author: Caj

customer_reviews.title: sharp look, easy watering
customer_reviews.text: easy to install, nice way to water plants every 3 days
customer_reviews.author: craig coshow

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: Great buy easy to install dress up the house nicely
customer_reviews.author: Mike Watts

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Love it! Cant wait to put flowers in it! Come on spring!
customer_reviews.author: Joy Balsome

customer_reviews.title: Product is great. Well built
customer_reviews.text: Product is great. Well built, great design and manufactured in the USA!! Only issue was with order fulfillment. I was shipped the incorrect color product and it took a couple weeks of back and forth calls to call center in India to resolve the issue.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy Planter Boxes
customer_reviews.text: I own five of these planter boxes and they work well and are built to last.
customer_reviews.author: Bob Nordin

customer_reviews.title: Top quality
customer_reviews.text: This is the 5th set I have bought! Very Happy with Quality and style.
customer_reviews.author: Pam Mcmasters

customer_reviews.title: Quite a deal
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Looks terrific and sturdy. Holds up well to full sun.
customer_reviews.author: Rivergirl

customer_reviews.title: Looks GREAT!
customer_reviews.text: The window boxes are easy to install, sturdy, and look terrific!
customer_reviews.author: bethcumberland

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: What an easy way to bring beauty to your home!
customer_reviews.author: c smith

customer_reviews.title: ❤️ My Windowbox!
customer_reviews.text: ❤️❤️❤️❤️❤️It! Might order another one! Daughter might order one too!
customer_reviews.author: luluc

customer_reviews.title: It was perfect for my use
customer_reviews.text: It was perfect for my use! Only thing is I had to silicone one hole on the bottom for using in doors.
customer_reviews.author: Dr F.

customer_reviews.title: The Very BEST Window Box Planter!
customer_reviews.text: I bought three 36" box planters in May of '13... My flowers are GORGEOUS! The box planters are wonderful - the look, the hanging design & the way the walls hold so much water. BEST product out there!
customer_reviews.author: H. Harvey

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Boxes
customer_reviews.text: Boxes look great on my colonial style house and the are bigger than my previous boxes so I am able to get a better, fuller arrangement in them. They were also delivered in less then a week so that was a special bonus.
customer_reviews.author: John P Wetmore

customer_reviews.title: Very good quality, very nice appearance.
customer_reviews.text: These are very nice planters and approved by my wife who is very critical. I installed two of them on our stucco house using lead anchors and they look very good. I really like the reservoir at the bottom, and followed the planting instructions carefully to be sure the plants can take advantage of the water below and to limit the weight of the box when it is filled. I think we will buy complementary Mayne Fairfield patio boxes in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Peter G. Dolbee

customer_reviews.title: Nice Planter!
customer_reviews.text: Got two. Look great. Easy to install. Very pleased with purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Amy S.

customer_reviews.title: Nice and durable
customer_reviews.text: As described in listing. Nice looking and quite durable. Sturdy hardware included. No problem to install. Took less than 15 minutes.
customer_reviews.author: macairtraveler

customer_reviews.title: Looks like the real thing
customer_reviews.text: Saved me a ton of $! Looks like the real thing!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Better looking than the picture!
customer_reviews.text: This was exactly what we were looking for...MADE VERY WELL and we think smart looking. Deep enough but not too deep. We had to put 1layer of plastic bottles down and then fill with planting soil. The flowers look great!
customer_reviews.author: kate Cleveland

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: I bought four of these window boxes and have had them for over a month now... They are amazing!!! They are self watering and my window boxes do not ever dry out. I worried about them being over watered, but they have worked perfectly. They are well worth the price!
customer_reviews.author: Michelle M.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: These are great. They look just like wood and are easy to put up.
customer_reviews.author: Sallie Dunning

customer_reviews.title: window box planters
customer_reviews.text: I AM VERY HAPPY WITH THE QUALITY OF THESE WINDOW BOXES AND THE WAY THEY ARE CONSTRUCTED THEY WILL LAST FOR YEARS. WOULD HIGHLY RECCOMEND.
customer_reviews.author: robin lukowski

customer_reviews.title: Resin planter
customer_reviews.text: These resin planters are great, we bought them in different sizes. They look fantastic and the won't rust or crack in the cold.
customer_reviews.author: Linda K.

customer_reviews.title: Modern and Durable
customer_reviews.text: I love this window box planter, it has a modern look and very durable (everyone thinks that it is metal). It gives my home extra character without looking too traditional
customer_reviews.author: Holly

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love them. They look so nice under my windows.
customer_reviews.author: Faye

customer_reviews.title: Just waht I was looking for....
customer_reviews.text: Very happy! Good construction, easy to install, looks great. I got mine in black, hides the dirt, installed it over vinyl siding. What else can I say?
customer_reviews.author: George B. Strelke

customer_reviews.title: I LIKE IT!
customer_reviews.text: The planter came in the amount of time it said and was packed well! I like the planter and it seems very rugged and sturdy. Haven't planted anything in it yet. I'm ordering another one.....a five foot one. I like the idea of the sub irrigation system. When it has plants in it I will send another review. I think it will be beautiful. Jean Miller PS. We have ordered many things through Amazon over the years and have always been satisfied...and most always...free shipping!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Jean Miller

customer_reviews.title: Black may not be your best choice in hot climates
customer_reviews.text: Installed under a southern exposure window & warping in the heat. Yes, getting a black window box was probably not the smartest in our heat but I expected it to last longer than a year. Self watering only works for deep rooted mature plants that can reach down far enough to access the moist soil. Daily watering is still required for annuals, which is what window boxes are primarily planted with. Wasps love to make nests in the space between the window box overhang & house so beware. I'm hoping to fill the area with vinyl boards to prevent this.
customer_reviews.author: DIYQueen

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful!
customer_reviews.text: My cedar window boxes bit the dust after 16 years of Ohio weather. I couldn't find similar replacements, so I bought these after much research. They look beautiful and are so lovely filled out with my spring/summer flowers. The self watering feature is new to me and has saved the plants during the intense summer heat. The install wasn't difficult, but does require measuring and accurate bracket placement. Once the brackets are up, the planters slide right into place. So glad I found these!!!
customer_reviews.author: HTS

customer_reviews.title: Reservoir doesn’t work...floods!
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy, looks good and great value. The only problem is that the reservoir doesn’t drain properly. I removed all the optional plugs at the bottom of planter for maximum drainage. After the first day of rain there was so much water in the planter that my flowers were floating/ drowning. After manually removing the water twice due to flooding, I drilled holes through the bottom of the planter so excess water could drain out. This defeated the purpose of the reservoir but it’s still a nice planter box for the cost.
customer_reviews.author: Dr Robert Beaty

customer_reviews.title: Soooo happy with these
customer_reviews.text: Looked and looked for these and luckily found them. Sturdy, attractive, self-wateting, and elegant bracket installation. Our plants are very happy, their appearance under our windows is attractive, and we are getting lots of compliments - "That's exactly what I want." Expensive, but worth it. The price on Amazon was the lowest I found.
customer_reviews.author: NormCIO

customer_reviews.title: Adds Character to Any Home!
customer_reviews.text: Amazing quality and would buy again! Very easy to install and holds a lot of weight. I am so satisfied with this purchase. They look great on my house. Very happy!
customer_reviews.author: tori

customer_reviews.title: Look great
customer_reviews.text: Replaced bulging, sagging cheap plastic flower boxes in front of house. I don't need to water the flowers as often. Paid a bit more, but very pleased with quality and look---these will not bulge or sag.
customer_reviews.author: Sonja

customer_reviews.title: Great planter boxes.
customer_reviews.text: These were expensive but worth the price. They are so sturdy and durable. And we like the look. We use them as planters on the ground rather than window boxes.
customer_reviews.author: S R L

customer_reviews.title: Great product.
customer_reviews.text: Lightweight. Easy to install. Great style. Good features with water trough in the bottom.
customer_reviews.author: bdubu

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: great buy....very well made, sturdy and gave my front yard such an upscale feel
customer_reviews.author: Giovanelly

product_meta.title: Mayne Fairfield 5822B Window Box Planter, 3-Foot, Black
product_meta.description: Brighten up the exterior of your home by adding color and beauty with the Mayne Fairfield Window Box. This durable construction offers a low maintenance solution and cleans with just a simple rinse of a garden hose.
feature_bullets: Mayne molded plastic planters are made from 100% high-grade polyethylene, with a double wall design creating a water reservoir.
Water reservoir capacity is approximately 3 gallons (11 Liters)
Includes 3 wall mount brackets with a black powder coated finish

The weather-proof and ultra-tough construction allows you to enjoy your window box all year long with very little winter preparation. The UV inhibitors within the resin allows for a long lasting fade-free performance.
15 Year Warranty – Residential Application, 5 Year Warranty – Commercial Application. Made in the USA.
Outside Dimensions: 36"L x 11"W x 10.8"H. Inside Dimensions: 32"L x 7.5"W x 8"D

specifications.Warranty Description: 16 year warranty - residential application, 5 year warranty - commercial application.
specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.8 out of 5 stars163 ratings4.8 out of 5 stars
